content: 2 complete the then stop at the complete the for a smoother double_crochet last pull through double_crochet colour change using the next before the colour using the next stop at the last pull colour red change colour pink through before the next colour fasten_off the pink and continue with red for round 3 round 3 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts for round 3 stop complete the slip tie a knot and cut continue to before the slip_stitch with the next off the previous round 4 using stitch colour light pink colour red light pink rember to work around the yarn tails to hide them round 4 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in the first followed by 2 single_crochet in the next st then 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts for round 3 stop complete the slip tie a knot and cut continue to before the slip_stitch with the next off the previous round 4 using stitch colour red colour light pink red rember to work around the yarn tails to hide them round 5 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next 3 sts repeat around join with a slip_stitch 50 sts fasten_off and cut a 45 cm piece then cut a 45 weave in the yarn of light pink yarn piece of yellow tail to make the 4 yarn to make the segment lines seeds repeat around then tie a knot and cut the yarn tails short place the tomato on top of the cheese onion white round 1 make a magic_ring chain 1 into the magic_ring make 6 single_crochet join with a slip_stitch 6 sts round 2 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 12 sts round 3 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 18 sts round 4 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in the first followed by 2 single_crochet in the next st then 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 24 sts round 5 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next 3 sts repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts round 6 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts followed by 2 single_crochet in the next st then 1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts repeat around join with a slip_stitch 36 sts fasten_off and cut about 150 cm weave in the yarn of purple yarn tail make a purple ring around the edges of each round place the onion on top of the tomato top bun golden wheat round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round
